title: Brown Dwarf Formation through Gravitational Collapse: Insights from 3D Numerical Simulations
excerpt: This paper presents the first 3D simulated Brown Dwarfs, formed through an isolated gravitational collapse.
citation: Adnan Ali Ahmad et al 2025 ApJL 991 L32

title: Turn up the light: Radiative efficiency of protostars at birth
excerpt: This letter discuses the radiative efficiency of protostars at birth.
citation: Asmita Bhandare, Adnan Ali Ahmad and Benoît Commerçon A&A, 702 (2025) L7
